db:abstract.db:para: The QTextFormat class provides formatting information for a QTextDocument.

db:note.db:para: All functions in this class are reentrant.

db:listitem.db:para: QTextFormat is part of Rich Text Processing APIsshared

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A QTextFormat is a generic class used for describing the format of parts of a QTextDocument. The derived classes QTextCharFormat, QTextBlockFormat, QTextListFormat, and QTextTableFormat are usually more useful, and describe the formatting that is applied to specific parts of the document.

A format has a FormatType which specifies the kinds of text item it can format; e.g. a block of text, a list, a table, etc. A format also has various properties (some specific to particular format types), as described by the Property enum. Every property has a corresponding Property.

The format type is given by type(), and the format can be tested with isCharFormat(), isBlockFormat(), isListFormat(), isTableFormat(), isFrameFormat(), and isImageFormat(). If the type is determined, it can be retrieved with toCharFormat(), toBlockFormat(), toListFormat(), toTableFormat(), toFrameFormat(), and toImageFormat().

A format's properties can be set with the setProperty() functions, and retrieved with boolProperty(), intProperty(), doubleProperty(), and stringProperty() as appropriate. All the property IDs used in the format can be retrieved with allPropertyIds(). One format can be merged into another using merge().

A format's object index can be set with setObjectIndex(), and retrieved with objectIndex(). These methods can be used to associate the format with a QTextObject. It is used to represent lists, frames, and tables inside the document.

db:section.db:title: enum QTextFormat::FormatType
db:section.db:para: This enum describes the text item a QTextFormat object is formatting.

db:td.db:para: An invalid format as created by the default constructor
The object formats a text block
The object formats a single character
The object formats a list
The object formats a frame

db:section.db:title: enum QTextFormat::ObjectTypes
db:section.db:para: This enum describes what kind of QTextObject this format is associated with.

db:td.db:para: The first object that can be used for application-specific purposes.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.2] enum QTextFormat::PageBreakFlag
db:section.db:para: This enum describes how page breaking is performed when printing. It maps to the corresponding css properties.

db:td.db:para: The page break is determined automatically depending on the available space on the current page
The page is always broken before the paragraph/table
A new page is always started after the paragraph/table

db:section.db:para: This enum was introduced in Qt 4.2.
The PageBreakFlags type is a typedef for QFlags<PageBreakFlag>. It stores an OR combination of PageBreakFlag values.

db:section.db:title: enum QTextFormat::Property
db:section.db:para: This enum describes the different properties a format can have.

db:td.db:para: The index of the formatted object. See objectIndex().

db:section.db:para: Paragraph and character properties

db:td.db:para: How a frame is located relative to the surrounding text
The layout direction of the text in the document (Qt::LayoutDirection).

db:section.db:para: Paragraph properties

db:td.db:para: Specifies the tab positions. The tab positions are structs of QTextOption::Tab which are stored in a QList (internally, in a QList<QVariant>).
The width of a horizontal ruler element.

db:section.db:para: Character properties

db:td.db:para: Specifies the change in size given to the fontsize already set using FontPointSize or FontPixelSize.
This property has been deprecated. Use QTextFormat::TextUnderlineStyle instead.
Specifies the capitalization type that is to be applied to the text.
Specifies the meaning of the FontLetterSpacing property. The default is QFont::PercentageSpacing.
Changes the default spacing between individual letters in the font. The value is specified as a percentage or absolute value, depending on FontLetterSpacingType. The default value is 100%.
Changes the default spacing between individual words. A positive value increases the word spacing by the corresponding pixels; a negative value decreases the spacing.
Corresponds to the QFont::Stretch property
Corresponds to the QFont::StyleHint property
Corresponds to the QFont::StyleStrategy property
Specifies whether the font has kerning turned on.
Controls the use of hinting according to values of the QFont::HintingPreference enum.
Specifies the (optional) tool tip to be displayed for a fragment of text.

db:section.db:para: List properties

db:td.db:para: Specifies the style used for the items in a list, described by values of the QTextListFormat::Style enum.
Specifies the amount of indentation used for a list.
Defines the text which is prepended to item numbers in numeric lists.
Defines the text which is appended to item numbers in numeric lists.

db:section.db:para: Table and frame properties

db:td.db:para: See the BorderStyle enum.

db:section.db:para: Table cell properties
Image properties
Selection properties

db:td.db:para: When set on the characterFormat of a selection, the whole width of the text will be shown selected.

db:section.db:para: Page break properties

db:td.db:para: Specifies how pages are broken. See the PageBreakFlag enum.

db:section.db:title: QTextFormat::QTextFormat()
db:section.db:para: Creates a new text format with an InvalidFormat.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QTextFormat::QTextFormat(int type)
db:section.db:para: Creates a new text format of the given type.

db:section.db:title: QTextFormat::QTextFormat(const QTextFormat &other)
db:section.db:para: Creates a new text format with the same attributes as the other text format.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QTextFormat::~QTextFormat()
db:section.db:para: Destroys this text format.

db:section.db:title: QBrush QTextFormat::background() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the brush used to paint the document's background.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::boolProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property specified by propertyId. If the property isn't of QTextFormat::Bool type, false is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: QBrush QTextFormat::brushProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property given by propertyId; if the property isn't of QVariant::Brush type, Qt::NoBrush is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::clearBackground()
db:section.db:para: Clears the brush used to paint the document's background. The default brush will be used.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::clearForeground()
db:section.db:para: Clears the brush used to paint the document's foreground. The default brush will be used.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::clearProperty(int propertyId)
db:section.db:para: Clears the value of the property given by propertyId

db:section.db:title: QColor QTextFormat::colorProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property given by propertyId; if the property isn't of QVariant::Color type, an invalid color is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: qreal QTextFormat::doubleProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property specified by propertyId. If the property isn't of QVariant::Double or QMetaType::Float type, 0 is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: QBrush QTextFormat::foreground() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the brush used to render foreground details, such as text, frame outlines, and table borders.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::hasProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the text format has a property with the given propertyId; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: int QTextFormat::intProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property specified by propertyId. If the property is not of QTextFormat::Integer type, 0 is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::isBlockFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is a BlockFormat; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::isCharFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is a CharFormat; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.3] bool QTextFormat::isEmpty() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the format does not store any properties; false otherwise.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::isFrameFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is a FrameFormat; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::isImageFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is an image format; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::isListFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is a ListFormat; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] bool QTextFormat::isTableCellFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is a TableCellFormat; otherwise returns false.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::isTableFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is a TableFormat; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the format is valid (i.e. is not InvalidFormat); otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: Qt::LayoutDirection QTextFormat::layoutDirection() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the document's layout direction.

db:section.db:title: QTextLength QTextFormat::lengthProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property given by propertyId.

db:section.db:title: QVector<QTextLength> QTextFormat::lengthVectorProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property given by propertyId. If the property isn't of QTextFormat::LengthVector type, an empty length vector is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::merge(const QTextFormat &other)
db:section.db:para: Merges the other format with this format; where there are conflicts the other format takes precedence.

db:section.db:title: int QTextFormat::objectIndex() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the index of the format object, or -1 if the format object is invalid.

db:section.db:title: int QTextFormat::objectType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the text format's object type.

db:section.db:title: QPen QTextFormat::penProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property given by propertyId; if the property isn't of QVariant::Pen type, Qt::NoPen is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: QMap<int, QVariant> QTextFormat::properties() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a map with all properties of this text format.

db:section.db:title: QVariant QTextFormat::property(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the property specified by the given propertyId.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.3] int QTextFormat::propertyCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of properties stored in the format.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.3.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::setBackground(const QBrush &brush)
db:section.db:para: Sets the brush use to paint the document's background to the brush specified.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::setForeground(const QBrush &brush)
db:section.db:para: Sets the foreground brush to the specified brush. The foreground brush is mostly used to render text.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::setLayoutDirection(Qt::LayoutDirection direction)
db:section.db:para: Sets the document's layout direction to the specified direction.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::setObjectIndex(int index)
db:section.db:para: Sets the format object's object index.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::setObjectType(int type)
db:section.db:para: Sets the text format's object type to type.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::setProperty(int propertyId, const QVariant &value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the property specified by the propertyId to the given value.

db:section.db:title: void QTextFormat::setProperty(int propertyId, const QVector<QTextLength> &value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the value of the property given by propertyId to value.

db:section.db:title: QString QTextFormat::stringProperty(int propertyId) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the property given by propertyId; if the property isn't of QVariant::String type, an empty string is returned instead.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.0] void QTextFormat::swap(QTextFormat &other)
db:section.db:para: Swaps this text format with other. This function is very fast and never fails.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: QTextBlockFormat QTextFormat::toBlockFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this format as a block format.

db:section.db:title: QTextCharFormat QTextFormat::toCharFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this format as a character format.

db:section.db:title: QTextFrameFormat QTextFormat::toFrameFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this format as a frame format.

db:section.db:title: QTextImageFormat QTextFormat::toImageFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this format as an image format.

db:section.db:title: QTextListFormat QTextFormat::toListFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this format as a list format.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] QTextTableCellFormat QTextFormat::toTableCellFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this format as a table cell format.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: QTextTableFormat QTextFormat::toTableFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this format as a table format.

db:section.db:title: int QTextFormat::type() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the type of this format.

db:section.db:title: QVariant QTextFormat::operator QVariant() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the text format as a QVariant

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::operator!=(const QTextFormat &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is different from the other text format.

db:section.db:title: QTextFormat &QTextFormat::operator=(const QTextFormat &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the other text format to this text format, and returns a reference to this text format.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextFormat::operator==(const QTextFormat &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this text format is the same as the other text format.
